thread.title: nancy
thread.title_full: Kayla Itsines Bikini Body Guide Workout Discount Site reviewed by nancy

author: nancy
title: nancy
text: When I ran across the discount site, on more than one blog, when researching BBG I was super excited AND weary. Being that I am new to BBG and have zero clue how this will play out for me, I didn't really want to pay the full price for the 12 week program. I figured what the heck, the site must be legit if bloggers are promoting it. AND IT IS! I am super excited to join the BBG community and paying a price tag that is more in my comfort zone.
